content:
```xml
<repairs>
    DEL_EDGE | rm | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the `TAKES_MEDICATION` relationship between the patient "Earle679" and the medication "Humulin 70/30 Injectable Suspension," as it contains an ingredient ("mestranol") to which the patient is allergic. This ensures that the patient is not treated with a medicine containing an allergen.
